readwritelock

类 HashMapReadWriteDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • readwritelock.HashMapReadWriteDemo
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class HashMapReadWriteDemo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    运行结果大致如下： begin time:1463716487998 ........end time:1463716489733 putCount:500000 read write lock time:1735 map begin time:1463716489733 .......map end time:1463716491353 putCount:500000 map time:1620 结论：HashMap 要比 TreeMap 的效率高很多，置于为什么 读写锁消耗的时间比synchronized还要多，还要进一步做对比
    作者:
    朱素海
